001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
011
012/**
013 * A {@link Regime} decorator that dumps the internal node activations of a
014 * {@link NeuralNetwork} before and/or after each training epoch.
015 *
016 * <p>This regime is typically used for debugging and inspection. It wraps
017 * another regime, delegates the actual training to it, and uses
018 * {@link NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)} to output the state of
019 * the network. The dump can optionally include input nodes.</p>
020 *
021 * <h3>Behavior</h3>
022 * <ul>
023 *   <li>If {@code firstTime} is true, the network is dumped once before the
024 *   first training step.</li>
025 *   <li>The network is always dumped after each delegated training epoch.</li>
026 *   <li>If {@code includeInputs} is true, input node values are included in the
027 *   dump; otherwise only hidden and output nodes are dumped.</li>
028 * </ul>
029 *
030 * @see NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)
031 * @see DelegatedRegime
032 */
033@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
034public class DumpNodesRegime extends DelegatedRegime {
035
036    private boolean firstTime;
037    private boolean includeInputs;
038
039    /**
040     * Creates a new regime that dumps node values of the given network during training.
041     *
042     * @param regime        the underlying regime to delegate training to
043     * @param firstTime     if true, the network is dumped once before training begins
044     * @param includeInputs if true, input nodes are included in the dump
045     */
046    public DumpNodesRegime(Regime regime, boolean firstTime, boolean includeInputs) {
047        super(regime);
048        this.firstTime = firstTime;
049        this.includeInputs = includeInputs;
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Returns whether the network will be dumped once before training starts.
054     *
055     * @return {@code true} if the network is dumped before the first epoch, otherwise {@code false}
056     */
057    public boolean isFirstTime() {
058        return firstTime;
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Sets whether the network should be dumped before training begins.
063     *
064     * @param firstTime {@code true} to dump before the first epoch, {@code false} otherwise
065     */
066    public void setFirstTime(boolean firstTime) {
067        this.firstTime = firstTime;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Returns whether input nodes are included in the dump.
072     *
073     * @return {@code true} if input nodes are included, {@code false} otherwise
074     */
075    public boolean isIncludeInputs() {
076        return includeInputs;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Sets whether to include input nodes in the dump.
081     *
082     * @param includeInputs {@code true} to include input nodes, {@code false} otherwise
083     */
084    public void setIncludeInputs(boolean includeInputs) {
085        this.includeInputs = includeInputs;
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Trains the given estimation function with the wrapped regime and dumps the
090     * network nodes before and/or after training.
091     * <p>
092     * If the estimation function is a {@link NeuralNetwork}, its nodes are
093     * printed using {@link NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)}.
094     * </p>
095     *
096     * @param estimationFunction the model to train (only {@link NeuralNetwork} is dumped)
097     * @param trainingSet        the dataset to train on
098     * @param objective          the objective (loss) function
099     * @param optimizer          the optimizer to apply updates
100     * @param <E>                the type of estimation function
101     */
102    @Override
103    public <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer) {
104        if (firstTime) {
105            dumpNodes(estimationFunction);
106        }
107        regime.train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer);
108        dumpNodes(estimationFunction);
109    }
110
111    private void dumpNodes(EstimationFunction estimationFunction) {
112        if (estimationFunction instanceof NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
113            NeuralNetworks.dump(neuralNetwork, includeInputs);
114        }
115    }
116}
